name: NEON KNIGHT
description:
Evil robots have overrun Space Station 9! Only Neon Knight can stop them!


Old-school FPS in a neon package with lasers and robots!
Fast paced action, bunny hopping, double and rocket jumping.

Laser pistols and SMGs, laser sword, plasma shotgun and double shotgun, Gatling laser, rocket launcher, pulse rifle, laser rifle and more!
